elements.label: Tarnished Story
elements.description: I feel like I have exhausted this story of its substance by telling it. I should move, experience new things, meet with a different crowd in order to give it new colours.

elements.label: Grim
elements.description: What is that urge in the human heart, to seek the darkness even when their life is light?

elements.label: Grim
elements.description: What is that urge in the human heart, to seek the darkness even when their life is light?

elements.label: Rousing
elements.description: It's the stories of great excitement that make children wish they could grow up already, and adults remember the excitement of their youth.

elements.label: Rousing
elements.description: It's the stories of great excitement that make children wish they could grow up already, and adults remember the excitement of their youth.

elements.label: Wise
elements.description: Some truths are so simple they can only be made clear in fables and fantasies.

elements.label: Wise
elements.description: Some truths are so simple they can only be made clear in fables and fantasies.

elements.label: Whimsical
elements.description: Reality can be a taxing exercise. Everyone sometimes longs for a more pleasant alternative.

elements.label: Whimsical
elements.description: Reality can be a taxing exercise. Everyone sometimes longs for a more pleasant alternative.

elements.label: Witty
elements.description: Humor is the sword that cuts kings and the flame that cannot be extinguished. Laughter can unite without language.

elements.label: Witty
elements.description: Humor is the sword that cuts kings and the flame that cannot be extinguished. Laughter can unite without language.

elements.label: Occult
elements.description: All stories enact the passions of the Hours in some guise, but few are as blatant as this one is.

elements.label: Occult
elements.description: All stories enact the passions of the Hours in some guise, but few are as blatant as this one is.

elements.label: Romantic
elements.description: Those things that soften the soul, from a pastoral idyll to simmering passion.

elements.label: Romantic
elements.description: Those things that soften the soul, from a pastoral idyll to simmering passion.

elements.label: Tragic
elements.description: Fates unavoidable, hubris unbearable, peaks unreachable. Still, we tell it anyway.

elements.label: Tragic
elements.description: Fates unavoidable, hubris unbearable, peaks unreachable. Still, we tell it anyway.

elements.label: Apollonian
elements.description: All that is touched and tinted by that immortal light above.

elements.label: Apollonian
elements.description: All that is touched and tinted by that immortal light above.

elements.label: Dionysian
elements.description: The low feelings of the underbrush, the undercurrent, the underbelly.

elements.label: Dionysian
elements.description: The low feelings of the underbrush, the undercurrent, the underbelly.

elements.label: Mortal
elements.description: What Passions burn in these fire-fly lives, can burn brighter than the evening sky.

elements.label: Mortal
elements.description: What Passions burn in these fire-fly lives, can burn brighter than the evening sky.

elements.label: C'thonic
elements.description: Beyond the doors to death, below the shifting earth, before the nights' veil.

elements.label: C'thonic
elements.description: Beyond the doors to death, below the shifting earth, before the nights' veil.

elements.label: Horomachistry
elements.description: The Passions and Movements of the Hours, Names and all the higher Players on the worlds Stage.

elements.label: Horomachistry
elements.description: The Passions and Movements of the Hours, Names and all the higher Players on the worlds Stage.
